projects.name: Customer Feedback Sentiment Dashboard
projects.description: Web dashboard showing live sentiment scores powered by internal ML service.

projects.name: Ad Serving Platform
projects.description: Handles ad selection and delivery across store locations. High throughput microservices.

projects.name: Payments
projects.description: Payment processing microservices and reconciliation pipelines.

tickets.title: Sentiment widget blank when ML API returns empty payload
tickets.description: Frontend sentiment widget shows 'Loading...' indefinitely on staging.
tickets.root_cause: ML API failed for emoji-only reviews
tickets.solution: Handle null responses; add frontend fallback

tickets.title: Sentiment API returns null values for some requests
tickets.description: ML service intermittently returns null sentiment scores for certain review texts.

tickets.title: Feature-flagging missing for sentiment widget in staging
tickets.description: Staging rollout lacks feature flag guard for new widget, causing inconsistent behavior.

tickets.title: Ad-serving rate limiter misconfigured for EU rollout
tickets.description: Regional rate limiter uses wrong threshold leading to partial outages in EU region.

tickets.title: Payment microservice intermittent 500s under load
tickets.description: Intermittent errors traced to DB connection pool exhaustion during peak traffic.
